description:
NVIDIA released a beta version of the upcoming NVIDIA 570 graphics driver promising VRR support on multi-monitor setups, performance improvements for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, and other changes.

The post NVIDIA 570 Linux Graphics Driver Promises VRR Support on Multi-Monitor Setups appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVIDIA 570 Linux Graphics Driver Promises VRR Support on Multi-Monitor Setups

description:
GCompris 25.0 open-source educational software suite providing entertainment tools for children aged 2 to 10 is now available for download. This release brings new and improved activities.

The post GCompris 25.0 Open-Source Educational Suite Released with Five New Activities appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: GCompris 25.0 Open-Source Educational Suite Released with Five New Activities
